page.title: 14Sidmouth Beach.
page.content: Sidmouth's beach is very popular during the summer months. Many activities may be pursued there, including{windsurfing}and{sailing. The east side of the main beach is called{Port Royal.}This is where the River Sid meets the sea. The Sidmouth fishing boats and trawlers are kept here. Nearby is a fish market, which is situated next to the Ham. This is a large recreation ground with swings, slides and climbing frames for younger children and a large grassed area for older people to play football or cricket.
